0.4.2.name: wordpress/irate
0.4.2.description:
The iRateMyDay official widget just show your image, but not your comment. This plugin fits in a sidebar and show your status and your image too.

It only needs your username, a Widget title (if you want) and the plugin will check your status from time to time.

iRate has been translated to french by the InMotion Hosting Team. Thanks for your time guys!

Screenshots are in spanish because it's my native language. As you should know yet I spe'k english, and the plugin use it by default.
